message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to counteroffer at $100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $125.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $110 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll offer the product to you for $122.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $115 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more adjustment. I'll offer the product to you for $119.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $116 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more adjustment. I'll offer the product to you for $118.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counteroffer at $117 for the product.
